attributes.action: Stop the closure of post offices
attributes.additional_details: The local community meet in local places , a post office Que is one of those! We see the same people behind the counter. The elderly recognise them and feel safe ! It’s a passport office too for mums to get photos done and fast tracked and so much more! Everyone will have to go into the city for a post office . Not good for the environment
attributes.background:
Our local banks have closed , people use the post office instead of the bank ! Local businesses use it as well as the community ! 
Intervene and protect our high street , our community and our jobs

rejection.details:
Decisions about closing individual post offices are a decision for the Post Office.

The Government set the minimum access criteria which states that 99% of the UK population are required to be within three miles of their nearest Post Office outlet.

You could start a petition to change that requirement, if that's what you'd like.
